title: Sweet Planting Life of Two Young Masters - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Cooking   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Easy Going Life   Familial Love   Family   Farming   Heartwarming   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Poor to Rich   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: Coconut and Potato   椰汁土豆丸
description: Soon after the youngest son in the Fang family was born, he was taken away by a human trafficker and ended up in a small village. Ten years later, his biological parents found him and took him back. Fang Yan followed his parents back to the capital city while holding all his possessions--one chicken, one duck and a basket of eggs. There was nothing bad about the city except a lack of land. Fortunately, he had his mobile space.>
